title: CESC to award 300MW solar power project to subsidiary Purvah Green
description: CESC Limited has chosen its subsidiary, Purvah Green Power, to develop a 300 MW solar PV project. Half of the capacity will be under tariff-based competitive bidding in India, with the rest under the greenshore option. The power purchase agreement will last for 25 years, starting from the scheduled commencement of power supply.
